Key Match Events: Chet Holmgren suffered a right hip injury in the first quarter while trying to stop a drive by Andrew Wiggins.
Holmgren exited the game with four rebounds and zero points.
The Thunder lost the game 127-116 against the Golden State Warriors.
Post-Match Reflections: Thunder coach Mark Daigneault stated after the game that he had no updates on Holmgren's injury or his potential recovery time.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed concern for Holmgren's injury, hoping he is okay.
Jalen Williams mentioned that the team will know how to adapt if Holmgren has to be absent for an extended period.
